ticket.title: render :content_type does not work
ticket.original-body:
According to the documentation,
`render :content_type => 'some/mime', :partial => 'something'`
should set the Content-Type in the response header to `'some/mime'`. This does not work.
I have to use
`response.headers["Content-Type"] = "some/mime"`
`render :partial => 'something'`
instead for a work around.
- Tested in Rails 3.0.3.
